DataField.name: Control Description

DataField.value: Each time the activity is performed

DataField.name: Control Objective
DataField.value: Payroll accounts are reconciled on a monthly basis, including documentation,independent management review and approval and follow-up of reconciling items

Activity.Commentary: The HR admin will set up all the approved benefits requests on the system and following this you will know the costs of the benefits to the organization. You can then make the payments to benefits providers by transferring all the data onto the payments system.
If there are any adjustments required, you can set those up now
You can make a payment request on SAP, see attached guide for more details
Once the payments have been approved by the budget holder, you can release the payments to providers.

DataField.value: Segregation of duties (Workflow)

DataField.name: Risk

DataField.name: Control Description

DataField.value: Reject payment with correction advice

StatementLink.Statement: 4.4.3.3.3. Offer initial enrollment to new employees

Activity.Text: Enrol employee onto plan and update record
Activity.Commentary: In this process the HR admin is responsible for the setting up and continuous management of the master data on the system. Each year, or upon recruitment of a new employee, the benefits admin will offer enrolment to the employee and will approve the employee's choices. These will be communicated to you and you will need to set up these choices in the employee record.

Activity.Text: Inform payroll of salary adjustment figure
Activity.Commentary: If the benefits chosen require a salary change, you will need to inform payroll of the adjustment figure and make a note of this in the employee file.
After the employee has chosen the benefits they wish to apply for, you will need to check that the request is in line with the company policy

DataField.name: Risk
DataField.value: Bad quality training

DataField.value: Each time the activity is performed

DataField.name: Control Objective
DataField.value: Non starters (eg-withdraws offer, candidate withdraws acceptance, or 'no show') are informed to payroll and other departments on a timely basis and prior to payment

DataField.name: Control Description

DataField.name: Control Objective
DataField.value: Ensure training service offering of good quality and at budgeted cost

DataField.name: Risk
DataField.value: Poor training for employees, no skills development

DataField.name: Control Description
